EmailTemplate.name: EMC Women In Technology Event.Invitation (Current Customers)
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive invitation: Join us for Women of Impact - Transforming the Face of IT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PIVOTAL PRESENTS JOIN US FOR WOMEN OF IMPACT - TRANSFORMING THE FACE OF IT!
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
The EMC Federation will be hosting a Women in Technology networking event in Toronto on October 29th. The theme of the evening is “Women of Impact – Transforming the Face of IT,” and will feature a panel discussion featuring EMC’s Chief Sustainability Officer, Kathrin Winkler.
The goal of this event is to continue to foster and accelerate our diversity efforts and build a close relationship with the WITI organization.
You’re cordially invited to attend. Spaces are limited so register to reserve your spot.
AGENDA: 4:00pm - Dinner and Networking 5:45pm - Welcome Message and EMC Federation Overview 6:00pm - Panel Leader Introduction - Cheryl McGrath 6:05pm - Panel Discussion and Q&A 7:15pm - Panel Closing 7:20pm - Networking and Drinks
This unique evening will include a brief panel discussion from key local leaders in technology including Kathrin Winkler, EMC’s Chief Sustainability Officer. Our panel will discuss the following topics:
- Get Connected: Expand your network of professional contacts, skills and mentors. - Get Empowered: Build your knowledge of leadership positions in technology and a personal path for success. - Get Inspired: Meet and learn from powerful women who have succeeded and advanced in their careers.
Kindly register to reserve your spot! <https://emcinformation.com/280701/SI/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.ashx?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B%2FDC18kX3RUrJr6dfkz6htBZF5s8TM3DV1BFXrlU6kEISrk%3D>
If you have any queries about this email, please contact Emma Logue <mailto:elogue@pivotal.io> or Anisa Berisha <mailto:aberisha@pivotal.io>. EVENT DETAILS Malaparte, Bell Lightbox Building, 6th floor, Toronto WEDNESDAY October 29, 2014 4 - 9 pm. REGISTER <https://emcinformation.com/280701/SI/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.ashx>
